props.name: id
props.description: A unique ID. The component `_uid` will be used as default.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Dims the tag and hides the remove button

props.name: html
props.description:
If set to `true`, the `text` is rendered as HTML code,
otherwise as plain text

props.name: element
props.description: HTML element to use for each tag

props.name: layout
props.description:
You can set the layout to `"list"` to extend the width of each tag
to 100% and show them in a list. This is handy in narrow columns
or when a list is a more appropriate design choice for the input
in general.

props.name: sort
props.description: Whether to sort the tags by the available options

props.name: draggable
props.description:
Whether the tags can by sorted manually by dragging
(not available when `sort` is `true`)

methods.name: option
methods.description: Get corresponding option for a tag value

methods.name: tag
methods.description: Create a tag object from a string or object

slots.name: default
slots.description: Place stuff here in the non-draggable footer

slots.name: image
slots.description: Replaces the image/icon frame created via the `image` prop
